const response = await client.search({
  query: {
    boosting: {
      positive: {
        term: {
          text: "apple",
        },
      },
      negative: {
        term: {
          text: "pie tart fruit crumble tree",
        },
      },
      negative_boost: 0.5,
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
